environment_variables.FLUXIONPath: Path to directory containing the FLUXION executable script.
environment_variables.FLUXIONLibPath: Path to directory containing the FLUXION library (scripts).
environment_variables.FLUXIONWorkspacePath: Path to the temp. directory available to FLUXION & subscripts.
environment_variables.FLUXIONIPTablesBackup: Path to FLUXION's iptables backup file.
environment_variables.FLUXIONPreferencesFile: Path to FLUXION's preferences file, to be loaded afterward.
environment_variables.FLUXIONNoiseFloor: Constant denoting the reference noise floor level.
environment_variables.FLUXIONNoiseCeiling: Constant denoting the reference noise ceiling level.
environment_variables.FLUXIONWindowRatio: Declare window ration bigger = smaller windows
environment_variables.EUID: Effective user ID of the current process.
environment_variables.DISPLAY: Display environment variable for X sessions.
environment_variables.FLUXIONAuto: Flag indicating whether FLUXION is running in automatic mode.
environment_variables.FLUXIONDebug: Flag indicating whether FLUXION is running in debug mode.
environment_variables.FLUXIONAirmonNG: Flag indicating whether FLUXION is using airmon-ng.
environment_variables.FLUXIONWIKillProcesses: Flag indicating whether FLUXION should kill conflicting processes.
environment_variables.FLUXIONWIReloadDriver: Flag indicating whether FLUXION should reload the wireless driver.
environment_variables.FLUXIONOutputDevice: Device to output debug messages to.
environment_variables.FLUXIONHoldXterm: Flag indicating whether the xterm window should be held open.
environment_variables.FLUXIONVLineDefault: Default vertical line used by FLUXION.
environment_variables.FLUXIONVLine: Current vertical line used by FLUXION.
environment_variables.InterfaceUtilsOutputDevice: Output device for the InterfaceUtils library.
environment_variables.SandboxWorkspacePath: Workspace path for the SandboxUtils library.
environment_variables.SandboxOutputDevice: Output device for the SandboxUtils library.
environment_variables.InstallerUtilsWorkspacePath: Workspace path for the InstallerUtils library.
environment_variables.InstallerUtilsOutputDevice: Output device for the InstallerUtils library.
environment_variables.InstallerUtilsNoticeMark: Notice mark used by the InstallerUtils library.
environment_variables.PackageManagerLog: Log file for the package manager.
environment_variables.IOUtilsQueryMark: Query mark used by the IOUtils library.
environment_variables.HashOutputDevice: Output device for the HashUtils library.
environment_variables.FluxionTargetMAC: MAC address of the target access point.
environment_variables.FluxionTargetSSID: SSID of the target access point.
environment_variables.FluxionTargetSSIDClean: Sanitized version of the target SSID.
environment_variables.FluxionTargetChannel: Channel of the target access point.
environment_variables.FluxionTargetEncryption: Encryption type of the target access point.
environment_variables.FluxionTargetMakerID: First 8 hexadecimal digits of the target MAC address.
environment_variables.FluxionTargetMaker: Vendor of the target access point.
environment_variables.FluxionTargetRogueMAC: MAC address of the rogue access point.
environment_variables.FluxionTargetTrackerInterface: Interface used by the target tracker daemon.
environment_variables.FluxionTargetTrackerDaemonPID: Process ID of the target tracker daemon.
environment_variables.FluxionDone: Last executed instruction in a namespace.
